GapFillInput.Title: Phrases for comparing
GapFillInput.Instruction: Complete the gaps with one of the phrases for comparing (e.g. the same as) from Module 3.

Content.Question:
1. A big city is the same as|exactly the same as a large city.
2. A boss is similar to|about the same as|very similar to a manager.
3. Doing the housework is different from|completely different from|very different from doing your homework.
4. I really like sports is similar to|very similar to|about the same as I love sports.
5. A well-known film star is the same as|exactly the same as a famous film star.
6. A stranger is completely different from|different from|very different from a friend.
7. A small mistake is the same as|exactly the same as a little mistake.
8. To read is completely different from|different from to ride.
9. She speaks fast is the same as|exactly the same as she speaks quickly.
10. I really donâ€™t like dogs is similar to|about the same as|very similar to I hate dogs.
